# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GSL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${GSL_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${GSL_CXX_FLAGS}")


File(GLOB runtimepytests "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/gsl/test_*.py")
set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/gsl/test/test_cg_optimizer.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/gsl/test/test_qn_minimizer.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/gsl/test/test_simplex_minimizer.py )

foreach (test ${runtimepytests} ${pytests})
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
  if(EXISTS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/gsl/${name}.pytests")
    FILE(READ "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/gsl/${name}.pytests" contents)
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE ";" "\\\\;" contents "${contents}")
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE "\n" ";" contents "${contents}")
    foreach(testline ${contents})
      string(REGEX REPLACE "([A-Za-z0-9_]+\\.[A-Za-z0-9_]+) (.*)" 
                           "\\1;\\2" split "${testline}")
      list(GET split 0 methname)
      list(GET split 1 docstring)
      add_test("gsl.${name}.${methname}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh python ${test} "${methname}")
      set_tests_properties("gsl.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.gsl;test")
      set_tests_properties("gsl.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES MEASUREMENT "docstring=${docstring}")
    endforeach()
  else()
    add_test("gsl.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh python ${test})
    set_tests_properties("gsl.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.gsl;test")
  endif()
endforeach(test)

set(cpp_tests  )

foreach (test ${cpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("gsl.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("gsl.${name}"     imp_gsl
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
    ${GSL_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("gsl.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/gsl/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name})
   add_test("gsl.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/gsl/${name}${CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX}")
   set_tests_properties("gsl.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.gsl;test")
   set(executables ${executables} "gsl.${name}")
endforeach(test)

add_custom_target("imp_gsl_tests" ALL DEPENDS ${executables})
